serviceInvoiceItem.accountUid: {% if accountUid %}{{ accountUid }}{% else %}{% if object.accountUid %}{{ object.accountUid }}{% else %}{% endif %}{% endif %}
serviceInvoiceItem.taxCode: {% if taxCode %}{{ taxCode }}{% else %}{% if object.taxCode %}{{ object.taxCode }}{% else %}{% endif %}{% endif %}
serviceInvoiceItem.totalAmountInclTax: {% if totalAmountInclTax %}{{ totalAmountInclTax }}{% else %}{% if object.totalAmountInclTax %}{{ object.totalAmountInclTax }}{% else %}{% endif %}{% endif %}
